short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fun duck jump game that plays in a popup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reach new heights and set records! Dive into this fun and addictive pop-up game.

Embark on an endless adventure in Duck Jump:

1) Navigate Duck using the arrow keys through a continuous playfield where the left and right edges connect seamlessly.
2) Watch out! Falling off the bottom of the screen will end your game.
3) Your highest score is tracked and displayed in the top right corner of the game area.

Enjoy the excitement of Duck Jump at no cost. Have a blast and aim high!
